eu.cassandra.sim.math.response
Class Incentive

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.math.response.Incentive

public class Incentive
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for implementing the (monetary) incentives proposed to the consumers in order to respond accordingly. They can be either penalty incentives (meaning an increase in the price of the power) or a reward (meaning a decrease in the price of power).

Version:
0.9, Date: 29.07.2013
Author:
Antonios Chrysopoulos

Constructor Detail

Incentive

public Incentive(int start,
                 int end,
                 double base,
                 double bDiff,
                 double aDiff,
                 double diff)
A constructor of an incentive where all of the input variables are known.

Parameters:
start - The incentive's start minute of the day
end - The incentive's end minute of the day
base - The base pricing scheme for the same interval
bDiff - The pricing difference with the previous time interval
aDiff - The pricing difference with the next time interval
diff - The pricing difference
